    • constantCall

      make a constant call - no broadcasting
      Parameters:
      ownerAddr - the current caller.
      contractAddr - smart contract address.
      function - contract function.
      Returns:
      TransactionExtention.
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if function cannot be found in the contract.

    • triggerCall

      public TransactionBuilder triggerCall​(java.lang.String ownerAddr, java.lang.String contractAddr, org.tron.tronj.abi.datatypes.Function function) throws java.lang.Exception
      make a trigger call. Trigger call consumes energy and bandwidth.
      Parameters:
      ownerAddr - the current caller
      contractAddr - smart contract address
      function - contract function
      Returns:
      transaction builder. Users may set other fields, e.g. feeLimit
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if function cannot be found in the contract
      java.lang.Exception
